BoosDesc.SourceString: The world boss <blue>Apophis</> in Banges has been "<red>activated</>" and its HP is greatly increased. The safety of the shelters nearby is in jeopardy. All able-bodied Wanderers, please find and eliminate this colossal threat. While "<red>activated</>," <blue>Apophis</> will not regain HP outside of battle, and its boss chest will contain a large amount of <orange>Activation Core I</>.

ActivityDesc2.SourceString: Heirs of Aida enemies will drop <orange>Activation Core I</>, which can be exchanged in the Event Store for bountiful rewards.

BoosDesc.SourceString: The world boss <blue>Frost Bot</> in Navia has been "<red>activated</>" and its HP is greatly increased. The safety of the shelters nearby is in jeopardy. All able-bodied Wanderers, please find and eliminate this colossal threat. While "<red>activated</>," <blue>Frost Bot</> will not regain HP outside of battle, and its boss chest will contain a large amount of <orange>Activation Core II</>.

ActivityDesc2.SourceString: Ravager enemies will drop <orange>Activation Core II</>, which can be exchanged in the Event Store for bountiful rewards.
